item.title: Pane Switcher
item.author: wouter.brunenberg@hotmail.com (Wouter Brunenberg)
item.description: Overview 🗺️ ‘Pane Switcher’ is an application I crafted for a programming test at school. The challenge was to replicate a given example app within 90 minutes. This app featured a button that, when pressed, would modify the appearance of various panels. Although I completed the task within the exam period, I chose to refine my work at home for better results. Technologies Used 🛠️ Java: The core language for crafting the application’s logic.
